attributes.action: STOP EASTERN EUROPEAN MIGRANTS TAKING OUR JOBS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A LAW TO MAKING IT ILLEAGAL TO EMPLOY A PERSON WHO WAS NOT BORN IN THE UK, IF THERE IS A PERSON BORN IN THE UK, ABEL TO DO THE JOB. GIVING UK BORN RESIDENTS A FAIR CHANCE OF GETTING A JOB

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
